data.title: Transport ministry pushes North flood mitigation
data.description: The Transport Ministry will present a comprehensive flood-mitigation plan for Chiang Mai and Chiang Rai at a mobile cabinet meeting in Chiang Mai on Friday, according to Transport Permanent Secretary Chayatan Phromsorn on Monday.

data.title: Phuket steps up for  carbon-free tourism
data.description: Phuket took a significant step toward sustainable tourism with the launch of the "Phuket Old Town Carbon Neutrality 2030" initiative, aimed at making the historic old town the first carbon-neutral area in Thailand by 2030.

data.title: Ministers summoned over Khao Kradong dispute
data.description: The House committee on land, natural resources and the environment has summoned the interior and transport ministers to provide more information on the Khao Kradong land controversy on Wednesday.

data.title: Thaksin 'key factor' in Udon Thani win
data.description: The ruling Pheu Thai Party believes former prime minister Thaksin Shinawatra played a key role in helping its candidate secure victory in the provincial administrative organisation (PAO) chairman election in Udon Thani.

data.title: Govt keen to downplay sea spat
data.description: The government expressed confidence on Monday that the 2001 memorandum of understanding on joint development in the Gulf of Thailand signed by Thailand and Cambodia would not trigger mass protests.

data.title: Thai politician Samart arrested over iCon Group fraud case
data.description: Police arrested politician  Samart Janechaijittawanich  in the northernmost province of Chiang Rai on Monday after he was wanted for alleged  money laundering  in connection with  The iCon Group  fraud case.

data.title: Court okays detention of Dr Boon’s wife, daughter in huge fraud case
data.description: The police and victims are against bail for fear of them fleeing or tampering with evidence; testimony from 10 additional witnesses pending

data.title: Khao Kradong dispute: Authority of land revocation body faces query
data.description: House panel chaired by People’s Party MP to address Buri Ram land dispute, as state land department calls on SRT to prove ownership

data.title: NESDC releases Q3 2024 Thai Social Conditions Report
data.description: Household-debt growth slowed, amounting to 16.32 trillion baht, with a growth rate of 1.3%,

data.title: Foreigners flee Myanmar scam gang into Thailand's Mae Sot
data.description: TAK: Thirty-nine foreign nationals who claimed to be victims of a  call centre gang  were  rescued  Monday morning by Thai authorities during a border patrol operation.

data.title: Experts urge Thailand to create its own streaming hub to rival Netflix
data.description: Media professionals say a domestic platform would enable Thailand’s thriving content creation industry to reach international market

data.title: Thailand targets unsafe beta-agonist use in meat industry
data.description: Department to launch a campaign to teach livestock farmers about the dangers of using drugs to make the meat of their animals redder

data.title: Foreigners flee scam gang
data.description: TAK: Thirty-nine foreign nationals who claimed to be victims of a call centre gang were rescued Monday morning by Thai authorities during a border patrol operation.

data.title: Compensation planned for buildings affected by new Suvarnabhumi runway
data.description: Airports of Thailand Plc is planning to issue  compensation  to owners of houses and other buildings to be impacted by the opening of a  new runway  at Suvarnabhumi Airport slated for early next year.

data.title: Unlock the Power of Play with Nintendo | The Nation in Brief
data.description: The gaming scene in Thailand has reached a new high with the opening of the country’s first Nintendo Authorized Store at Siam Paragon.

data.title: More protests will only harm the economy, Phumtham tells Sondhi
data.description: Defence minister encourages former PAD leader to take the legal route, saying Pheu Thai is ready to fight any challenge

data.title: Baan Dalaa x Grok 1970 | The Nation Lifestyle
data.description: Baan Dalaa by Angkana and Grok 1970 celebrate the richness of Thai ingredients by creating 12 exclusive cross-cultural dishes inspired by the provinces of Surat Thani and Ratchaburi. Each dish reflects their artistry and inspiration.

data.title: People’s Party gains ground in Udon Thani despite loss in CEO poll
data.description: Buoyed by strong voter support at the Sunday election, ex-Move Forward leader believes the opposition party will win at least one House seat in the Northeast province

data.title: Thai farmers urged to embrace smart farming technologies
data.description: Agricultural Extension Department launches new initiative in partnership with Siam Kubota

data.title: Malaysian court orders return of Swatch LGBTQ-themed watches
data.description: KUALA LUMPUR - A Malaysian court ordered the government on Monday to return rainbow-coloured watches and accessories made by Swatch Group that were seized last year  for designs celebrating LGBTQ rights , a prosecutor told Reuters.

data.title: Schools must address diversity: expert says
data.description: Intercultural strategist tells parents of kids at international schools that diversity is about far more than LGBTQ+

data.title: Philippines' Marcos vows to fight back after VP's assassination threat
data.description: MANILA - Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos on Monday vowed to fight back against what he called reckless and troubling threats against him, speaking out after his estranged vice president said he would be assassinated if she herself were killed.

data.title: International schools can be a soft power for Thailand
data.description: International schools have the potential to become Thailand’s soft power by attracting expats wanting to study here and thus generating revenue for the country, the International Schools Association of Thailand (ISAT) said in an interview on Friday (November 22).

data.title: Thai politician Samart wanted over iCon Group fraud case
data.description: The Criminal Court issued a warrant for the arrest of politician Samart Janechaijittawanich for alleged money-laundering in connection with The iCon Group fraud case.

data.title: Thai politician Samart arrested over iCon Group fraud case
data.description: Police arrested politician  Samart Janechaijittawanich  in the northernmost province of Chiang Rai on Monday after he was wanted for alleged  money laundering  in connection with  The iCon Group  fraud case.

data.title: Matchanuland: a convenient day trip from Bangkok
data.description: Matchanuland features four themed zones, each designed to offer unique learning experiences

data.title: Thai ministry saddened as tainted Laos moonshine claims another life
data.description: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs has expressed its condolences after a second Australian teen transferred from Laos to be treated for methanol poisoning after drinking tainted liquor, died on Sunday.

data.title: Palang Pracharath’s Samart arrested over money laundering allegations
data.description: DSI nabs former deputy spokesman in Chiang Rai on charges of laundering money for iCon Group, after arresting his mother for being an accomplice

data.title: Thai Union’s Strategy 2030 Eyes USD 7 Billion Revenue
data.description: Aiming to double earnings and lead in marine health and nutrition, Thai Union’s transformative plan targets substantial growth by 2030.

data.title: Experience a Thai-Style Christmas Spectacular at King Power
data.description: As global tourism springs back to life, King Power, Thailand's premier travel retail destination, is transforming its Rangnam location into a magical winter wonderland with an extraordinary Thai twist.

data.title: Phu Hin Rong Kla park blooms with rainbow of everlasting daisies
data.description: Visitors chill out amid colourful displays and cooling temperatures at Royal project in the forested hills of Phitsanulok

data.title: Millennium Hilton Bangkok Unveils Major Renovations, Elevating Riverside Luxury
data.description: November 2024: - The iconic Millennium Hilton Bangkok (MHB) has evolved with an extensive renovation and innovative makeover, positioning the riverside hotel as a revitalised epicentre for luxury stays in the Thai capital.
